item.title: Quotes
item.description: Life Information is not knowledge Knowledge is not wisdom Wisdom is not truth Truth is not beauty Beauty is not love Love is not music Music is the best. - Frank Zappa I have this thought experiment I do in moments like that…. I imagine being nothing at all. Dead and gone. And while being dead and gone and nothing, you were allowed to re-live just one moment again of your long lost life for a just a couple minutes and it just so happens to be the one you are in living in right now.
